name: Galactic Miner (hardtrancefan)
description:
This game is optimised for Mobile devices. Please download the .apk and try it on your Android device.

Collect the gems while avoiding and blasting the space pirates. Collect gems, upgrade you space ship and weapons. See if you can top the leaderboard withing 5 rounds.

Made for GDevelop Weekend Game Jam #2

Liluo link : https://liluo.io/mrmen/galactic-miner
